pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mutation Analysis Toolkit for COVID-19 (Coronavirus Disease 2019) // A feasible framework for mutation analysis and reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) assay evaluation of COVID-19, including mutation profile visualization, statistics and mutation ratio of each assay. The mutation ratio is conducive to evaluating the coverage of RT- PCR assays in large-sized samples. Mercatelli, D. and Giorgi, F. M. (2020) doi:10.20944/preprints202004.0529.v1.
